title: Dietary Needs: Restrictions (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Restrictions subcategory within Dietary Needs. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: I don't eat meat. I eat fish.
cards.romaji: Niku wa tabemasen. Sakana wa tabemasu.
cards.japanese: 肉は食べません。魚は食べます。
